subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Despite the fact that Curlin is the 7-5 favorite, rival trainers are convinced that this may be the deepest field in the 25-year history of the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
snippet: Despite the fact that Curlin is the 7-5 favorite, rival trainers are convinced that this may be the deepest field in the 25-year history of the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
